name: Let Me Vaporize
description:
This is a game made for Blackthornprod GAME JAM #2!

You control a water drop and your goal is to get to the sun by jumping through portals located at the center of each level. You can pick up stones and trees to help you get to the end. 

Controls:

Move left: A
Move right: D
Jump: Space
Click on objects to pick them up
Pick up object: Left mouse click
Drop object: Left mouse click
Rotate object left: Q
Rotate object right: E
Toggle map: M
Zoom: Scroll wheel
Speed up time: Tab (Hold)
Restart level: R (Press twice)
Main menu: Esc (Press twice)
Toggle controls help: C

If you think you can't go anywhere, press M to se the map and maybe hold tab to see how the planets move. Every level can be finished.

Credits:

Everything exept the music was created by me (BatoRoy).

Music from Jukedeck - create your own at http://jukedeck.com
